channel.title: RSC Unleashed! New RSC private server! With Pics!
channel.description:
This is a new 24/7 server with great admins. over 130 members have registered in the last 4days. The server is run by Bam and Yong. They are great admins, and have put alot of time into the game. They have high exp rates, currently at about 250x but we are working on a rate that everyone can enjoy. We have mini games and even more are being added, gambling mini game is being added as well as others. events, new NPC's, new armour, new suits are being added, new hat's have been implemented as well as masks. You can customize your armour, and do much more in this new server! I will post some pictures of the server below. Hope to see everyone there!!
added shop items in edgeville shop-------working added party hats and masks-------------working added fisherman------------------------working added gnomepilot-----------------------working added Adventurer-----------------------working
Added Dragon Master--------------------adjusted drop rate and items dropped added new area for training--------------working added blue 2-handed sword---- added Dragon square halves--- get both halves pay a mil to put them together. MORE TO COME
[IMG]http://i201.photobucket.com/albums/aa245/pkrwitprayer/dragsq.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i201.photobucket.com/albums/aa245/pkrwitprayer/waveminigame.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i201.photobucket.com/albums/aa245/pkrwitprayer/brothers.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i201.photobucket.com/albums/aa245/pkrwitprayer/dragonmaster.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i201.photobucket.com/albums/aa245/pkrwitprayer/kbd.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i201.photobucket.com/albums/aa245/pkrwitprayer/rscu.jpg[/img]
Message Aaron for a free R2h.

I’VE HEARD NOTHING GOOD ABOUT IT, AND EVERYONE I’VE TALKED TO WHO PLAYED IT SAID EITHER IT FUCKING SUCKED OR YOU HAVE THE MENTALITY OF A FUCKING THREE YEAR OLD.

item.title: RSC Unleashed! New RSC private server! With Pics!
item.dc:creator: @Kozy Kozy
item.description:
@Kozy wrote:

[quote=“Ch3rry, post:23, topic:278005”][quote author=playerAction link=topic=366946.msg2782092#msg2782092 date=1242102868]
If you want this server to become popular, you have to add something that other servers don’t have.

At the moment, this is a generic EasyRSC server. Not very appealing.
[/quote]
Tbh I think has to do more with the advertising, stability of the server, and the way things are ran.Take rsca for example…It didn’t have anything really “new” at all. The reason it became popular was up time, mature staff, and new advertising ideas. Try Getting on youtube and searching “how to play rsc for free.” A full tutorial comes up showing how to register for rsca (Not so small on views if I might add). Obviously If anyone is going to make a decent server they will have to learn what worked and what didn’t work from past servers.[/quote]

RSCA has alot of stuff that nobody knows about, from what I’ve overheard. It has tons of stability upgrades and under the hood updates. It’s also really close to original RSC.

-Kozy

Read full topic
